title: 21st Century Archmage - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Army Building   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Confident Protagonist   Demons   Doting Love Interests   Dragon Riders   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fantasy World   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Interdimensional Travel   Kind Love Interests   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Priestesses   Romantic Subplot   Shameless Protagonist   Spirit Users   Spirits   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Kim Gwang-su
description:
While on a school field trip in the Czech Republic, Kang Hyuk happens to stumble into a shop called “Archmage.”

 To his disbelief, the shop is actually owned by an archmage… from another world! Forced to become the Archmage’s disciple, Kang Hyuk is punted into the Kallian Continent, where might and magic overwhelm and wyverns fly high in the sky…

In this world, people are either sword-wielding knights, magic-wielding mages, or spirit-wielding summoners. 

There hasn’t been anyone yet who can do all three… until now.>
